game.name: Fruitslasher
game.description:
If playing fruit cutting games is the best thing to do when you have some free time to have fun, you have come at the right place. Your objective is to cut as many fruits as you can with a knife at the proper angles in Fruit Slasher. Slicing different kinds of fruits will also help you to reward you with some points. Slice as many fruits as possible to set your own new high score. You can share that score with your friends and families group over social media sites.

Try to work on combos to boost your score fast in this brand new arcade game. Creating high score will depend upon how wisely you use your blade. Avoid cutting the bombs and try not to leave even the plats or boards that you see coming on the screen! Be careful as you would have only 3 lives to use hitting a bomb or missing three lives will cause you a loss in the game! Apply the vicious strike to cut fruits through the air!

Slice two or more pieces of fruits using the same stroke and get a chance to earn a generous arcade-style bonus in this fruit slasher game! Join it today and get a chance to become an eagle-eyed samurai who is anxiously looking forward to improve his skills and blade! Our website is full of fruit-slashing games for kids that are playable on multiple devices, including desktops, mobile phones, tablets, as well as iPhones or iPads. Stay tuned with us to enjoy more fun and win exciting rewards daily online without download games!
